page.title: 04Yardley Hastings School
page.content: In Yardley Hastings Primary School there are 2 classes with 35 children all together, 15 in the infants and 20 in the juniors with an even number of boys and girls. They have quite a small playground but a big playing field. For their lunches they use the hall across the road,they also use this hall for P.E and assemblies.They do not have any hot dinners,all the children bring sandwiches. When the school goes out on trips, the Headteacher books the minibus which they share with 13 other village schools.In 1984 the school was given a computer, and the disc drive and printer were bought from the proceeds of the "Yardley Hastings Society" annual fete. The old school house next to the school is used as the secretaryÂ£s office and store room
